name: No More Ancestor!
description:
The Grandfather Paradox:

What would happen if a time traveller went back in time to kill their grandfather?

If they succeeded, they would've never been born... but if they were never born, how could they go back in time to kill their grandfather?

In "No More Ancestor", you play in a reality where your ancestors live beside you, and your actions have consequences!

WASD - To Move

SPACE - To Jump

LEFT CLICK - To Shoot
